mapper.select: select distinct cc.course_id,c.number,c.name,c.course_type,c.course_class, (select name from department where department_id = c.department_id) course_dep, c.score,c.time,cc.teacher_id,t.name as teacher_name from (class_course cc left join teacher t on t.teacher_id=cc.teacher_id) left join course c on cc.course_id=c.course_id where c.course_id in (select course_id from class_course cc where teacher_id=#{id}) and cc.teacher_id!=#{id} order by c.number

select c.course_id,c.number,c.name,c.course_type,c.course_class, (select name from department where department_id = c.department_id) course_dep, c.score,c.time,t.teacher_id,t.name as teacher_name from teacher t,course c,class_course cc where cc.teacher_id=t.teacher_id and cc.course_id=c.course_id and cc.class_id= (select class_id from student where student_id=3)

select c.course_id,c.number,c.name,c.course_type,c.course_class, (select name from department where department_id = c.department_id) course_dep, c.score,c.time,t.teacher_id,t.name as teacher_name from (supervisor_course s left join course c on s.course_id=c.course_id) left join teacher t on t.teacher_id=s.teacher_id order by course_dep,c.number
select * from individual_evaluation where role_id=4 and from_id=#{param1} and teacher_id=#{param2} and course_id=#{param3}
select * from individual_evaluation where role_id=3 and from_id=#{param1} and teacher_id=#{param2} and course_id=#{param3}
select * from individual_evaluation where role_id=2 and from_id=#{param1} and teacher_id=#{param2} and course_id=#{param3}
